exceptions.exn: No such bound variable Join (possible names are: worlds and SA).

original: apply Build_SeparationAlgebra with (Join := trivial_Join worlds). - intros m1 m2 m H. apply H. - intros mx my mz mxy mxyz H1 H2. exists mz. split. + apply join_comm with (m1 := my) (m2 := mz). apply H2. + apply join_assoc with (mx := mx) (my := my) (mz := mz) (mxy := mxy) (mxyz := mxyz) in H1. apply H1.
